Package com.oopsipushedtomain

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.oopsipushedtomain.User
public class User extends Object
This class defines and represents a user It also includes all database accesses for user functions

Outstanding Issues: - Need to implement more error checking - Need to implement a delete function

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(User.UserCreatedListener listener)
      Generates a new user and uploads them to the database Instantiates all parameters to null. They need to be set later
      Parameters:
      listener - The listener for determining when the transfer is complete

    • User

      public User(String userID, User.DataLoadedListener listener)
      Creates an instance of the new user class given a UID. Loads the data from the database
      Parameters:
      userID - The UID of the user to find in the database
      listener - Listener for checking when file transfer is complete

      Parameters:
